movies.title: Ida
movies.plot: Poland, 1962. Anna, an orphan brought up by nuns in the convent, is a novice. She has to see Wanda, the only living relative, before she takes her vows. Wanda tells Anna about her Jewish roots. Both women start a journey not only to find their family's tragic story, but to see who they really are and where they belong. They question what they used to believe in.
movies.simplePlot: Anna, a young novitiate nun in 1960s Poland, is on the verge of taking her vows when she discovers a dark family secret dating back to the years of the German occupation.

biography.bio: Agata Kulesza was born on September 27, 1971 in Szczecin, Zachodniopomorskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for Ida (2013), La chambre des suicidés (2011) and Rose (2011). She has been married to Marcin Figurski since 2006. They have one child.
biography.name: Agata Kulesza

biography.bio: Agata Trzebuchowska is a Polish actress who is quickly garnering international accolades for her debut performance as the title character in Pawel Pawlikowski's Ida. Wide-eyed, but not necessarily naive, Trzebuchowska breathes life into the complex and troubled, young Ida. Her performance gained her recognition from critics all over the world and award nominations from the European Film Awards and the Chicago Film Critics Association. The film itself secured an Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film, a Golden Globe nomination for Best Foreign Language Film and won "Best Film" at the European Film Award. Ida has also won best film at the London Film Festival, the Telluride Film Festival, the Golden Lion winner at the Gdynia Film Festival, and the Critics Prize Winner at the Toronto Film Festival.
biography.name: Agata Trzebuchowska

biography.bio: Dawid Ogrodnik was born in 1986 in Wagrowiec, Wielkopolskie, Poland. He is known for his work on Ida (2013), Life Feels Good (2013) and Ostatnia rodzina (2016).
biography.name: Dawid Ogrodnik

biography.bio: Jerzy Trela was born on March 14, 1942 in Lencze, Malopolskie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Ida (2013), Three Colors: White (1994) and On the Silver Globe (1988).
biography.name: Jerzy Trela

biography.bio: Adam Szyszkowski was born in 1968 in Poland. He is an actor, known for Ida (2013), Avalon (2001) and Ostatnia rodzina (2016).
biography.name: Adam Szyszkowski

biography.bio: Halina Skoczynska was born on July 2, 1953 in Ostrowiec Swietokrzyski, Swietokrzyskie, Poland. She was an actress, known for Ida (2013), They Chased Me Through Arizona (2014) and All That I Love (2009). She died on May 17, 2016 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Halina Skoczynska

biography.bio: Graduate of the Ludwik Solski State Drama School in Krakow, specialization in popular music vocals; actress of the Teatr Stary in Krakow. PROFESSIONAL EDUCATION The Fryderyk Chopin State Primary Music School in Krynica-Zdroj - piano class, the Mieczyslaw Karlowicz State Secondary Music School in Krakow - solo singing class, the Ludwik Solski State Drama School in Krakow - specialization in drama performance and popular music vocals. AWARDS 2009 - Sopot, 9th Polish National Festival of Radio and TV Theatre Two Theaters - Award for the Best Female Role, for the part of Halina Szwarc in the TV Theatre show Doktor Halina directed by Marcin Wrona. 2008 - Koszalin, 27th Debut Film Festival Young and Film - Award for Best Acting Debut in a Leading Role in Wednesday, Thursday Morning directed by Grzegosz Packa. 2007 - Gdynia Film Festival, Award of the Mayor of Gdynia for Best Acting Debut in Wednesday, Thursday Morning. 1998 - Third prize at the grand finale of the Szansa na sukces TV singing competition, for the performance of Miedzy cisza by Grzegorz Turnau.
biography.name: Joanna Kulig

biography.bio: Dorota 'Kookoo' Kuduk is a Polish actress best known for her performance in the Oscar-Winning Ida (2013), and, Klezmer (2015), as well as numerous Polish theatre and television roles. Kuduk won the "Best Actress" award for her role in Klezmer at the 13th Warsaw Jewish Film Festival in Poland. Early career: Kuduk graduated from the Polish State School of Film, Television and Theatre in Lodz making her theatrical debut in 2009. She continued to study under the artistic supervision of Beata Fudalej. In 2012 she played Ophelia in Shakespeare's "Hamlet" at the STU Theatre in Krakow. She lives and works in Warsaw and Krakow.
biography.name: Dorota Kuduk

biography.bio: Natalia Lagiewczyk is an actress, known for Ida (2013), Saved by the Bell (2014) and Knives Out (2016).
biography.name: Natalia Lagiewczyk

biography.bio: Afrodyta Weselak was born in 1990 in Poland. She is an actress, known for Ida (2013) and Czerwona butelka (2012).
biography.name: Afrodyta Weselak

biography.bio: Mariusz Jakus was born on November 26, 1967 in Chrzanów, Malopolskie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Fala zbrodni (2003), Ida (2013) and Une affaire d'hommes (2001).
biography.name: Mariusz Jakus

biography.bio: Izabela Dabrowska was born on August 22, 1966 in Bialystok, Podlaskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for Ida (2013), Tout ira bien (2007) and Life Feels Good (2013).
biography.name: Izabela Dabrowska

biography.bio: Artur Janusiak was born on February 5, 1971 in Szczecin, Zachodniopomorskie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Ida (2013), The Innocents (2016) and Przeprowadzki (2001).
biography.name: Artur Janusiak

biography.bio: Anna Grzeszczak was born on July 17, 1948 in Lódz, Lódzkie, Poland. She is an actress, known for Ida (2013), Edi (2002) and The Dark House (2009).
biography.name: Anna Grzeszczak

biography.bio: Jan Wociech Poradowski is an actor, known for Ida (2013) and Short Distance (2016).
biography.name: Jan Wociech Poradowski
